reslove.code:
# Definition for singly-linked list.
# class ListNode:
#     def __init__(self, x):
#         self.val = x
#         self.next = None

class Solution:
     def nextLargerNodes(self, head):
        res, st = [], []
        while head:
            while len(st) > 0 and head.val > st[-1][1]:
                res[st.pop()[0]] = head.val
            st.append((len(res), head.val))
            res.append(0)
            head = head.next
        return res
